title: #137: Surviving In Our Toxic World | Matt Landman
description:
The director of “Frankenskies” stops by to explain what we are up against when it comes to the invisible world of EMF radiation, chemtrails, and other forms of pollution.

Matt lays out the ways in which we are being impacted by the technology that we have come to be dependent on, as well as a few strategies for how to disconnect from the dangers of the frequencies. Through his company Spero Protection Clothing, Matt has created a line of clothes that help to protect people from the harmful radiation that we encounter on a daily basis.

Now that the CIA has openly admitted that they are involved in the chemtrail program will that finally wake people up to the reality of the situation happening above us, or will the sheep go back to staring at the ground and refusing to acknowledge reality?
